mapper.select: SELECT M.EMP_NO AS EMP_NO, M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME, COMMUTE_DATE, ATTEND_TIME, QUITTING_TIME, TARDY, D.NAME AS DEPARTMENT_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (M.DEPARTMENT_NO=D.DEPARTMENT_NO) JOIN COMMUTE_TIME C ON(M.MEMBER_NO=C.MEMBER_NO)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "FINALPROJECT"."COMMUTE_TIME" (COMMUTE_NO, MEMBER_NO, COMMUTE_DATE, ATTEND_TIME, TARDY) VALUES (SEQ_COM.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, to_date(#{day}, 'MM-DD-YYYY'),to_date(#{today}, 'MM-DD-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),( CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH') > '09' THEN 'Y' ELSE'N' END))
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT M.NAME AS NAME, D.NAME AS DEPARTMENT,TARDY,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMUTE_TIME WHERE TARDY='Y' GROUP BY TARDY) TARDYCOUNT,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ABSENCE GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) ABSENCE,ATTEND_TIME,QUITTING_TIME FROM COMMUTE_TIME C JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON(M.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO) JOIN ABSENCE A ON(C.MEMBER_NO = A.MEMBER_NO) WHERE M.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND COMMUTE_DATE = to_date(to_char(SYSDATE,'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY') GROUP BY C.TARDY, A.ABSENCE_NO, M.NAME, D.NAME,A.ABSENCE_NO, ATTEND_TIME, QUITTING_TIME
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUTE_TIME SET QUITTING_TIME = to_date(#{today}, 'MM-DD-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND COMMUTE_DATE = to_date(to_char(SYSDATE,'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM/DD/YYYY')
